headline: Consumers Energy Connecting with Customers After Brutal Cold Drives Up Energy Use and Bills
summary: On the heels of last week's brutal cold spell, Consumers Energy is reaching out today to customers who will see higher bills arrive over the next few weeks. We know higher bills can create stress — and we want every customer to be prepared and supported.
